about.title: CREATING A NEW WORLD OF FLAVORS
about.subtitle: ABOUT U BLANICKÝCH RYTÍŘŮ
description: Welcome to U Blanických rytířů, where traditional Czech cuisine meets the elegant atmosphere of a historic castle. Located in the beautiful Vlašim Castle surrounded by an English park, we bring authentic Czech flavors to every plate.

Our professional team of chefs meticulously crafts each dish using the finest local ingredients and traditional recipes. From hearty goulash to the classic svíčková, every bite reflects our commitment to preserving Czech culinary heritage while embracing modern presentation.
about.pageSubtitle: Castle restaurant with long tradition, completely renovated. Located in Vlašim Castle near the legendary Blaník Mountain.
about.metaDescription: Learn more about U Blanických rytířů castle restaurant in Central Bohemia

cta.title: READY TO EXPERIENCE
cta.description: Reserve your table today and embark on a culinary journey through the heart of Czech gastronomy in our historic castle setting

testimonials.text: Very nice atmosphere, professional service. Good food, the daily menu offers reasonable prices. Card payments accepted.
testimonials.author: Stanislav Staněk

testimonials.text: Best restaurant in Vlašim, excellent food. The castle basement setting is just the cherry on top.
testimonials.author: Jan Hlaváček

testimonials.text: We were here for the first time, and we were all satisfied. Excellent food, great beer too, and pleasant service as it should be. We'll gladly return. Thank you very much.
testimonials.author: Jaromír Blatník

testimonials.text: Excellent food, lovely service. I recommend the chicken steak with hazelnut sauce and potato pancakes, and the svíčková na smetaně.
testimonials.author: Petra Merhuliková

contact.title: CONTACT US

reservation.title: Table Reservation
reservation.description: We recommend booking in advance, especially on weekends and holidays. Contact us by phone or email.

contact.locationNote: The restaurant is located in the beautiful setting of Vlašim Castle surrounded by an English park, near the legendary Blaník Mountain.
contact.pageSubtitle: Call +420 732 878 238 for reservations. Located at Zámek 1, Vlašim, Central Bohemia.

footer.description: Stylish castle restaurant in Central Bohemia, near the legendary Blaník Mountain. Come taste authentic Czech cuisine in the beautiful setting of Vlašim Castle.
